Name: Blackbeard
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Top up with Cola (e.g. Coca-Cola or Pepsi)
Instructions: POUR ingredients in glass and serve.
Review: Something of a student drink, this tastes better than it sounds.
History: Thought to have originated in Stirling, Scotland, during the late 1990s.
Nutrition: One serving of Blackbeard contains 1091 calories
